plot: A young parapsychologist takes up residence in an old orphanage, hoping to capture evidence of the existence of supernatural activity.
title: The House Master
plot_es: A young parapsychologist takes up residence in an old orphanage, hoping to capture evidence of the existence of supernatural activity.
